title: 明天就要考试了，大家来祝福我吧，同时我也祝福每一  个学生。
author: HGK
txt_content:
大家好，我是HGK。是个初中党，准备考试了，在此发个帖向所有学生Good Lucky！



      Hoped fellow schoolmates the end of the period test a good result！

replies.author: 找了三天
replies.txt_content: [diamond_sword][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_hoe][diamond_helmet][diamond_chestplate][diamond_leggings][diamond_boots]   水晶一套送上，无视诅咒的哦！！

replies.author: HGK
replies.txt_content: 明天之前无法继续更新Mincraft服务器传。

replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 HGK 于 2014-1-12 18:05 编辑 

Thank you all for helping me!

replies.txt_content: 等我考出个好成绩会发个金贴
